abstracts.cdata!:
The project will assist the Government
            in the restoration of selected flood damaged irrigation,
            drainage, flood protection, and road infrastructure. The
            loan will provide funds for: (i) restoration of
            infrastructure, including bridges, culverts and other
            related structures; (ii) technical assistance for project
            implementation; and (iii) supervision and administration.
            Only in appropriate cases will rehabilitation involve
            improvement, for instance, providing more vents in bridges
            or enlarging drains for passing future floods. The civil
            works restoration involves about 1.1 billion cubic feet of
            earthwork, in addition to stonework, masonry work,
            bituminous surfacing and structures.
